name: missing (itch) (Appw)
description:
something i threw together when i had the idea to make a game entirely based around generic the purple and black missing file texture. written in Godot.

its a surreal experience. controls are WASD, F to respawn, SPACE to shoot, and ESC to return to the main menu.

the EXE creates a little file that stores a high score next to itself.

post your high score if you feel like it.
